Class GaussianFilter

    A Class for the computation of Gaussian filtering.
    Author:
    Julien Perret

    • Method Detail

      • gaussianFilter

        public static ILineString gaussianFilter(ILineString line,
                                         double sigma,
                                         double threshold)
        Compute the gaussian filtering of a set of input points.
        Parameters:
        line - the input line
        sigma - the gaussian filter parameter
        threshold - the threshold used for subsampling
        Returns:
        the result of a gaussian filter applied to the given set of points

      • extend

        public static ILineString extend(ILineString line,
                                 int k)
        Extend the given set of points at its fist and last points of k points using central inversion.
        Parameters:
        line - the input points
        k - the number of points to be added at the beginning and the end
        Returns:
        an extended set of points
